topics.body:
So my Computer Graphics class says we're gonna use Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign. DRAWINGS HYPE

Pre-Calc... pretty much exactly the same as last semester.

I basically just switched teachers for my religious studies class this semester, and I think it's the first time I've had a teacher that's [spoiler]pregnant.[/spoiler]

Web Design is pretty much us making up the semester as we go along. It's the teacher's first time teaching the subject.

I still need to go to my Anatomy and English classes, but they should be the same as last semester seeing as how I have the same teachers for those. Last class of the day is Econ, which I hear was really fun for those who took it last semester. I also hear it's going to be a tiny class this semester, with only 7 students in it (including myself).

This semester looks like it's going to be either really fun or really uneventful. Either way, I most likely will not have any trouble with it.
